comment: Professional and courteous teacher who he is very helpful to any student that needs it. Has a wealth of real world experience that applies to the subject.
Thank you, professor. He is professional and knows what he is doing. I did not see any problems with his teaching style, just fine.
Great teacher, has a lot experience in his teaching area. He is conservative, but very reliable and just professor.
This guy should not be teaching.  He may be decent at mediating, but teaching is not his calling.  My suggestion is hold off taking this course if he's the only person teaching it.
Avoid at all costs! He teaches Saturday classes and will fail you if you miss more than 2 classes! Very boring; very dry; very uninteresting! He repeats himself every 5 seconds! DO NOT TAKE HIM!
